data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: The user profile opens without an avatar or username, but with all the connections, then the app quickly returns to the reaction list
data.expected_result: The selected user profile should fully load
data.short_description: User profiles fail to load when accessed from a message's reaction list
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message that people reacted a lot to - Open up the list of reactions by press holding on the message and then selecting "Reactions", scroll down a bit and try opening a profile - Notice how the profile opens, but the app fails to load it and quickly returns to the reaction list.
